Hamish Stewart (born 12 August 2004) is an Australian professional rugby league footballer who plays as a  forward for the St. George Illawarra Dragons in the National Rugby League.
In round 1 of the 2025 NRL season, Stewart made his NRL debut for St. George Illawarra against the Canterbury-Bankstown Bulldogs at Jubilee Oval. Stewart played 19 games for St. George Illawarra in the 2025 NRL season as the club finished a disappointing 15th on the table.
